description: While Nozomi was young and attending the Kissaki City Trainers` School, she found an abandoned Nyarmar in a box in an alley. Nozomi kept the Nyarmar in the school`s shed where it was also cared for by Suzuna. Teacher Ooishi found out about it pretty quickly but relented and allowed Suzuna and Nozocchi to take care of Nyarmar.
name: Ooishi
